website_summaries.verdict: Sulfate-free for luxe locks, this hydrating shampoo is excellent for damaged and color-treated hair.

cons: Takes a few more washes than the others to see a decrease in brassiness

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on highlights.
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo worked great on my daughter's highlights. We have well water and her highlights we're getting a bit brassy. One shampoo and the brassiness was gone and her lovely highlights were back. This shampoo worked as well as high end salon shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Schmidtbauer

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective and Drying
customer_reviews.text: As a few others have noted, this really dried my hair out, and I’m not seeing any difference in the tone. I’ll update this after using it over the course of several weeks, but, if you can, you might be better off paying a bit more for a higher-quality product.

BLONDE SHAMPOO WITH IRIS BOTANICALS: Sulfate Free formula with Purple Iris extracts, EverPure Blonde System neutralizes brassiness & hydrates over-processed hair, restoring shine & protecting your color.
THE EVERPURE BLONDE SYSTEM: For best results, use EverPure Blonde shampoo & conditioner in tandem, for a gentle cleansing hair care system that balances blonde hair & neutralizes brassiness

WHY SULFATE-FREE? Sulfates are cleansing agents that help breakdown oil, dirt, and build up on the scalp and hair. But some sulfates can be harsh and stripping. Our sulfate-free shampoos and conditioners are non-stripping and made for color-treated hair
COMPLETE THE LOOK: Try with EverPure Intense Repair Hair Sheet Mask for a 5 minute hair spa and strengthened, protected locks
